title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 9 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 9 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


Tucker Carlson joined Clay and Buck for the third hour about the "dehumanization" of covering our faces during covid and other topics. The left gets away with mask mandates and lockdowns because we allow it. Book publishers are now an arm of the democratic party. Illegal immigration is how the left is changing the electorate. If invited, would you have gone to Obama's superspreader 60th birthday party? Golf with Joe Biden? Colorado Rockies become the perfect episode of Curb Your Enthusiasm.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
